src:
Hård kritik mot bantat fondtorg: ”Konkurrensen försämras enormt”
Statens fondtorg hårdbantas och drygt hälften av pensionsfonderna försvinner under de närmaste åren. Det står klart när fondutredningen nu presenterats. Samtidigt blir Sjunde AP-fonden ännu mäktigare, då myndigheten får ansvaret upphandla de fonder som ska igenom nålsögat.
04 Nov 2019, 16:13 by Hans Bolander

text:
Harsh criticism of slimming fund square: "Competition is deteriorating enormously"
The Government Fund Square is hardened and just over half of the pension funds will disappear in the next few years. It is clear when the fund investigation is now presented. At the same time, the Seventh AP Fund becomes even more powerful, as the authority is given the responsibility to procure the funds that will pass through the needle eye.
04 Nov 2019, 16:13 by Hans Bolander
